title: Serious Team Looking for coach/analysts
body:
Hey Guys,

We're a serious r5 team (plat/diamond) looking to progress into master and challenger and compete in amateur tournaments. We're reassembling a roster currently (given availability and practice dates of our last roster didn't synergise). We're looking for a coach and analysts who are willing to spend time with us and talk us through games, items, gold efficiency and tactics.

If you are interested please add me in game (IGN: Floz) or add our manager (IGN: Theta eSports).

Thanks guys.

replies.body:
Just a friendly hint, you won't find a good coach/analyst without paying them a decent wage (which OCE esports doesn't have a big enough infrastructure for unless you're a top team). 

Also, there is no serious competitive tournaments for another few months at least. No need to be looking this early as most of the recognizable coaches are on hiatus.

Hello. Im not avalible to add you or your manager since you're on OCE and my current accounts are on West,East,Russia,Turkey. 
I'd like you to email me if you're still interested in a choach/analyst.

My E-mail is Sebastian.a.frick@gmail.com
